means: 使失去勇气(dishearten的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: He was disheartened by their hostile reaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的敌对反应让他打了退堂鼓。

sentence.Network_en: He felt disheartened, as he had failed in the examination.
sentence.Network_cn: 考试失误, 他觉得很丧气.
微弱的掌声叫我们泄气.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 许国璋英语第二册_百度文库 ... cheer n. 鼓舞；欢呼 disheartened adj. 灰心；失望的 scotsman n. 苏格兰人.
Neither Have I-英语文章阅读-大耳朵英语 -... ... poison 毒害；破坏 disheartened 感到沮丧的；气馁的 earnestly 认真的；诚挚的.
disheartened 胆虚 disheartening dishearteningly 使人沮丧地 disheartenment 气馁;沮丧 dished 盘形凹陷的,有圆屋顶的 Disheir Dishelm Disherison Disherit Disheritance.
丧气 discouraged丧气 disheartened丧气地 despondently

list.abs: I get really disheartened because I still cannot speak English well ., 我真灰心因为我还是说不好英语.
The disheartened instructor tried vainly to arouse their interest ., 沮丧的教师试图激起他们的兴趣 , 但却是徒劳.
those young men are too easily disheartened by difficulties ., 那些年青人遇到困难时太容易泄气了.
He was not disheartened , and he continued with his researches ., 他没有失去信心 , 仍然继续自己的研究.

entry.def: If you are disheartened, you feel disappointed about something and have less confidence or less hope about it than you did before.

example.ex: He was disheartened by their hostile reaction.
example.tran: 他们的敌对反应让他打了退堂鼓。

sentences.sentence: "felt discouraged by the magnitude of the problem"
"the disheartened instructor tried vainly to arouse their interest"

auth_sentence.content: Disheartened, she retired to France the following year.
auth_sentence.res_content: Disheartened, she retired to France the following year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Disheartened, she retired to France the following year.

auth_sentence.content: I was disheartened after reading all of his writtings.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was disheartened after reading all of his writtings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was disheartened after reading all of his writtings.

auth_sentence.content: I am disparaged and disheartened by your commendations.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am disparaged and disheartened by your commendations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am disparaged and disheartened by your commendations.

sentences.en: He was beginning to feel very disheartened.
sentences.cn: 他开始觉得非常灰心丧气。
微弱的掌声叫我们泄气。
